Text:
Just stumbled upon this and realized: 
This is a rip-off of my 4-year-old torrent (my rip), but without the german subs. If there has to be a clone of a torrent that is very much alive - which I couldn't care less about- , why rid potential downloaders of additional subtitles? After all, there are about 90 million German native spekers, which, seen globally, istn't that much, I agree, but it also isn't negligible.

So here's for German subtitles:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3675275/Underground_%28Emir_Kusturica_1995%29
